sectionText: 4 hours: Cultural-Interpretive Theory and Method  Study of selected theories/methodologies of cultural and interpretive studies, with emphasis on historiography, criticism, and ethnography in fields related to kinesiology & community health. Some prominence also given to reading ?classic?/?canonical? works in cultural interpretive studies of kinesiology and community health.  Students will also practice annotation of course material to their specific research interest/dissertation topic.
